main event: A witness observed a strange object in the sky described as round, brilliant blue-white in color, emitting a pulsating light, moving rapidly then slowing before disappearing to the north.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes., The object was observed at an altitude of between 1,000 and 2,000 feet., The object changed speed dramatically, moving rapidly at first then slowing down., The object emitted a brilliant blue-white light and pulsated., Several persons in the area confirmed seeing the object at the same time.
sighted object: a round object emitting a pulsating light
